title: Making the Speech -  Conquer your Fear of Public Speaking
description:
Product Details

    * Directors: Jamie Salvatori
    * Format: WMV
    * Language: English
    * Studio: Jumby Bay Studios
    * DVD Release Date: June 1, 2005

Product Description

Making the Speech is a breakthrough in educational programming, with a storyline that is as entertaining as it is informative. Presented in a hip, "reality TV" inspired style, students will enjoy watching Stanley learn, as they themselves learn, the art of public speaking.

This excellently produced DVD is also packed full of special features! Making the Speech was a 2006 Telly Award Finalist and a Parents' Choice Approved Winner
